law.catch_line: Cabinet may transfer unneeded portions of appropriations for construction of projects from one project to another.
law.text: The cabinet may transfer unneeded portions of appropriations for construction of particular projects from one (1) project to another or to others, whether for the same or for a different agency, in order to secure the most efficient construction program.
law.history: Created 1956 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 7, Art. XVI, sec. 13, effective July 1, 1956.
